attributes.action: Invest more in giving NHS staff the correct and enough PPE.
attributes.additional_details: This needs to be done as thousands and thousands of NHS staff are risking their own lives and families lives during this pandemic and are struggling to get enough PPE.
attributes.background: Invest more money into giving NHS workers the correct PPE, they are risking their own lives and families because they aren’t getting given correct equipment or enough protective equipment.
